Source.Name: hipfft
Source.Description: hipFFT is an FFT marshalling library. Currently, hipFFT supports either rocFFT or cuFFT as backends. hipFFT exports an interface that does not require the client to change, regardless of the chosen backend. It sits between the application and the backend FFT library, marshalling inputs into the backend and results back to the application.
